content: madux james is the fifth square in a series of squares designed as a legacy for my grandchildren madux is thoughtful sensitive and incredibly sweet with an intellect that results in so many questions about the world around him use a 5 00 mm hook if you need a 12 square for your project i used a 4 5 mm hook for a 11 square to match the other squares in my legacy collections the skill level is intermediate the square has 39 stitches per side testers - jovette aparna eva teresa isabelle caryn sheela neetsey naurid donna liz petra alaina pauline and jacqui thank you for testing james madux **join my facebook group at ~ a yarn of serendipity crochet group 1 page links to all my patterns are found on my blog 2 or pinterest 3 ** 1 https //www facebook com/groups/www ayarnofserendipity/ 2 http //pknightonhaener wordpress com 3 https //pin it/g7fcaloku2wutj
